messages.title: Willie Rennie’s positive plan for Scotland:
messages.content: Education bounce back. Action on mental health. Jobs, jobs, jobs. Tackle climate change.

messages.title: Scottish Lib Dems will put recovery first.
messages.content: More and more people are backing the Scottish Lib Dems to put recovery first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Funding for mental health and support for our children in school.
Guarantee a job or training opportunity for every young person leaving education.

issues.education: The Lib Dems have secured enhanced funding for education. 'The pandemic risks leaving us with a generation of unemployed young people. Willie Rennie wants to guarantee a job or training opportunity for every young person leaving education.'
issues.health: Extra money for mental health and more support for our children in school.

endorsements.endorsement: The Scottish Lib Dems won some big victories this year, getting more investment in education, extra money for mental health and more support for our children in school. We need more Liberal Democrats in the Scottish Parliament, that's why they're getting my vote.

The pandemic risks leaving us with a generation of unemployed young people. Willie Rennie wants to guarantee a job or training opportunity for every young person leaving education. I'll be supporting them in May.

quotes.text: Sturgeon DOES want referendum before Covid recovery.
[Conservatives are] the same old nasty party they have always been.
The Lib Dems have secured enhanced funding for education, mental health and local government.

images.caption: Willie Rennie’s positive plan for Scotland: Education bounce back. Action on mental health. Jobs, jobs, jobs. Tackle climate change.
